Description_lang: Fires an explosion of bolts at all enemies in front of you, knocking them back, snaring them by $s4% for $d, and dealing $s1 Physical damage.$?s378771[When you fall below $378771s1% heath, Bursting Shot's cooldown is immediately reset. This can only occur once every $385646d.][]

description_blz.en_US: Fires an explosion of bolts at all enemies in front of you, knocking them back, snaring them by 50% for 6 sec, and dealing 27 Physical damage.
description_blz.es_MX: Dispara una explosión de flechas a todos los enemigos que están frente a ti, los repele y los frena un 50% durante 6 s, además de infligirles 28 p. de daño físico.
description_blz.pt_BR: Dispara uma explosão de setas em todos os inimigos à sua frente, repelindo-os, desacelerando-os em 50% por 6 s e causando 28 de dano Físico.
description_blz.de_DE: Feuert einen Geschosshagel auf alle Gegner vor Euch ab, der sie zurückstößt, ihre Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit für 6 Sek. um 50% verringert und ihnen 28 körperlichen Schaden zufügt.
description_blz.en_GB: Fires an explosion of bolts at all enemies in front of you, knocking them back, snaring them by 50% for 6 sec, and dealing 28 Physical damage.
description_blz.es_ES: Dispara una explosión de descargas a todos los enemigos frente a ti, los repele y los frena un 50% durante 6 s, además de infligirles 28 p. de daño físico.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous tirez un déluge de traits sur les adversaires situés devant vous, ce qui les repousse, les ralentit de 50% pendant 6 s et leur inflige 28 points de dégâts physiques.
description_blz.it_IT: Spara un'esplosione di colpi contro tutti i nemici frontali, respingendoli indietro, riducendone la velocità di movimento del 50% per 6 s e infliggendo 28 danni fisici.
description_blz.ru_RU: Залп стрел поражает противников перед вами, отбрасывая их, снижая скорость их передвижения на 50% на 6 сек. и нанося им 28 ед. физического урона.
description_blz.ko_KR: 전방의 모든 적에게 폭발적인 사격을 가해, 적을 뒤로 밀쳐내고 6초 동안 이동 속도를 50%만큼 감소시키며 28의 물리 피해를 입힙니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 向面前的所有敵人射出爆破箭矢，將其擊退並使其緩速50%，持續6秒，同時造成28點物理傷害。
description_blz.zh_CN: 向前方的所有敌人发射爆炸箭矢，将其击退，使其速度降低50%，持续6秒，并对其造成28点物理伤害。
